name: opencut
description: OpenCut is a self-hosted project planner and scheduling tool focused on makers or fabricators. It provides cut lists, material usage, and order management for workshop environments.
features: Cut list generation: Create optimized cutting plans from project dimensions to minimize material waste and costs.
Material tracking: Monitor inventory levels for wood, metal, and other materials with usage history and reorder alerts.
Project scheduling: Plan fabrication timelines with task dependencies and resource allocation for workshop efficiency.
Order management: Track customer orders from quote to completion with status updates and delivery scheduling.
Waste optimization: Calculate best cutting patterns to reduce scrap and maximize yield from stock materials.
Equipment planning: Assign tools and machines to tasks based on availability and project requirements.
Cost estimation: Generate accurate quotes by calculating material costs, labor hours, and overhead for each project.
Export options: Output cut lists and plans to PDF or CSV for shop floor use and integration with CNC systems.
